basicinformationcomments: This rate will be subject to a local tax adjustment which varies with the location of the customer.
description:
Available to customers who use energy storage devices with time-differentiated load characteristics approved by
the Company, such as electric thermal storage space heating and/or cooling systems and water heaters, which consume
electrical energy only during off-peak hours specified by the Company and store energy for use during on-peak hours. A
time-of-day meter is required to take service under this provision.
Customers who desire to separately wire their energy storage load to a time-of-day meter and their general-use load
to a standard meter shall receive service under the appropriate provisions of this Schedule.
energycomments:
Adjustments = Energy Efficiency/Demand Response Cost Recovery rider + Consumer Rate Relief charges + Vegetation Management Program surcharge + Construction Surcharge + Tax Reform Rider

Days acknowledged as national holidays (Christmas Day, New Years Day, Independence Day, Memorial Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day) are considered to be OFF-PEAK days regardless if they fall between M-F.

name: Schedule SGS: Small General Service Load Management T.O.D.
